articles.description: The level of criticism on Qatar in the lead up and in the first few days of the World Cup has probably been unprecedented for a global sporting event.
articles.content: A staggering 5 billion viewers are expected to watch the football World Cup over the course of the next month. It is, by far, the biggest sporting event in the world. On the eve of the tournament, th… [+7328 chars]

articles.author: Richard Fay
articles.title: Manchester United have two reasons to avoid Cody Gakpo transfer - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Man Utd are still interested in Cody Gakpo as they look to bolster their squad under Erik ten Hag next year.
articles.content: There are few forwards in world football attracting quite as much attention as Cody Gakpo is right now. The Dutch forward has netted two goals at the World Cup in as many games, fueling further specu… [+3621 chars]

articles.author: David Pasztor
articles.title: Ziyech turns it on to shock Belgium, Kovačić and Croatia return to form, Germany earn draw, Costa Rica eke ou… - We Ain't Got No History
articles.description: The drama continues at the World Cup on Day 8
articles.content: The theme for day eight was set by Belgium head coach Roberto Martínez, who claimed that we wouldnt see the teams true selves until a week or two into the competition and the end of the group stage, … [+2678 chars]

articles.author: Shashank Kishore
articles.title: Kotak, Cooley and Dilip put in charge of India A in Bangladesh - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Current India A coach VVS Laxman - as well as Hrishikesh Kanitkar and Sairaj Bahutule - are with senior side in New Zealand
articles.content: Sitanshu Kotak will be part of the India A coaching staff in the absence of VVS Laxman  •  Manoj Bookanakere/KSCA

articles.author: ESPNcricinfo staff
articles.title: Steve Waugh: 'The public has almost overdosed on cricket' - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: "For the fans and spectators, it is hard to make a connection because you're not sure who is playing"
articles.content: News"For the fans and spectators, it is hard to make a connection because you're not sure who is playing"
